title: Cajun-style ham and beans
ingredients: ['2 cans black-eyed beans, about 410 g each, drained and rinsed', '350 g (12½ oz) frozen sweetcorn, cooked and drained', '3 celery sticks, sliced', '1 small red onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, seeded and diced', '200 g (7 oz) piece of smoked ham, cut into 1 cm (½ in) chunks', 'sprigs of fresh coriander to garnish', 'Cajun dressing', '150 ml (5 fl oz) soured cream', '1 tbsp tomato ketchup', '15 g (½ oz) fresh coriander, finely chopped', '1½ tsp Cajun seasoning', 'Tabasco sauce', 'salt and pepper']
